Name: Tailwhip
Description: Deal 1 damage to exactly two enemies.

Name: Strike
Description: If you have played another action with your partner's icon today, deal 2 damage to one enemy.

Name: Lash Out
Description: Deal 2 damage to one enemy. If another enemy has been discarded from the field this turn, deal 4 damage instead.

Name: Constrict
Description: Deal 2 damage to one enemy. If you are damaging an encounter card, also blank each of its effects until tomorrow.

Name: Spit Venom
Description:
Lose 2 vitality.
Deal 4 damage to one enemy.

Name: Consume
Description:
Draw each hero card in your partner's hand.
Forage.
Your partner forages.

Name: Encircle
Description: Deal 6 damage divided as you choose between one or two enemies.
